players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other."
Bob: "Let's work together to figure out who the mafioso is. We can discuss our theories and share information."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Charlie. Let's all share any information we might have that could help us identify the culprit."
